content:
Former OU quarterback and Heisman winner Baker Mayfield pumps up the crowd during the game against Army Sept PERIOD   PERIOD

Baker Mayfield may have left Norman for the NFL but that doesnt mean Sooner fans have lost connection with Oklahomas latest Heisman Trophy winner PERIOD

Sports Talk Media on  AM and . fM announced the radio station will be Normans source for Cleveland Browns games every Sunday PERIOD

Big announcement We will be your home for the Browns each Sunday on SportsTalk 1400am and .3FM in Norman pic.twitter.comduC0C7h0uZ

The No PERIOD  overall pick in the  NFL draft became the Browns starter late in its game against the New York Jets two weeks ago getting Cleveland its first win in two years PERIOD In his two starts Mayfield has thrown for two touchdowns and two interceptions along with  yards PERIOD
